description: Allow AI systems to view and control your Starling Bank account via MCP.
name: io.github.domdomegg/starling-bank-mcp

environmentVariables.description: Starling Bank personal access token. Sign up for the Starling Developer Portal, link your account, and create a Personal Access Token.
environmentVariables.name: STARLING_BANK_ACCESS_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Optional: Key UID of the signing key for sending payments.
environmentVariables.name: STARLING_BANK_PRIVATE_KEY_UID

environmentVariables.description: Optional: PEM-encoded signing key for sending payments.
environmentVariables.name: STARLING_BANK_PRIVATE_KEY_PEM

title: Starling Bank
